Title: Establishes a school speed zone camera demonstration program in the village of Old Westbury
Summary: Establishes a school speed zone camera demonstration program in the village of Old Westbury in up to nine school speed zones.
LawCode: Add ยง1180-f, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a school speed zone camera demonstration program in the village of Old Westbury
